arts.ttl: Official: Modric handed rest as Dalic benches him for Croatia-Gibraltar
arts.sum: By: Isak Möller Luka Modric is starting on the bench for Croatia in their World Cup qualifier against Gibraltar this evening, as confirmed this evening. Modric has been playing a lot at the start of this season, despite the age of 40, but his body has handled the workload well. Given just how hard the midfielder works on […] The post Official: Modric handed rest as Dalic benches him for Croatia-Gibraltar appeared first on SempreMilan.
